name: Department to administer chapter
text:
PART IV.  CHILDREN WITH SPECIAL HEALTH NEEDS

   Department to administer [part].  The department of health is designated as the agency of the State to administer a program of services for children with special health needs.  [L 1939, c 179, §2; RL 1945, §2102; RL 1955, §46-41; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §19; HRS ; am L 1988, c 4, §2]
